line.content: /* FinaleScript can automatically format booklet pages for a Finale file of 4,
8, 12 and 16 pages. If your score has more than 16 pages, FinaleScript will
paginate correctly with blank pages at end. For example, 60 pages=16+16+16+12
while 57 pages=16+16+16+(9+3 blank), and so on.*/
message "Remember to set paper orientation to landscape in your printer."
